page.title: 11BEAMSMOOR AND OAKDENE
page.content: About a mile out of Sedbergh on the Hawes road there is a home for the elderly called{Beamsmoor}which has expanded over the past twelve months. There are eighteen residents with seventeen staff to look after them (although they are not all there at the same time). Most of the residents are local people who like living there and there is a long waiting list of people wanting to go in. {Oakdene}is a hotel nearby and there we met the lady who owns it with a partner. She told us that they have four part-time employees and they can cater for up to fourteen guests at one time. They also cater for local parties, wedding receptions and funerals. A lot of their trade is dependent on tourists travelling from the Lake District to the Dales.
